# NSBorderType.grooveBorder

**Case**

A thin border that looks etched around the image.

## Declaration

```swift
case grooveBorder
```

## Constants

- **NSBorderType.bezelBorder**: A concave border that makes the view look sunken.
- **NSBorderType.lineBorder**: A black line border around the view.
- **NSBorderType.noBorder**: No border.
